column1: #Text=Jeffrey.I agree that the surplus was planned and expected as part of the Cons re-election campaign.
#Text=I disagree with the proposition that a small surplus is irrelevant compared with the Canadian economy or the Federal Government's budget.
#Text=Balancing the books matters hugely in the private sector, it is an indicator that an organization is well managed.
#Text=Further a surplus of .67% vs a small deficit, compounded over many years does have an impact.I'm inclined to give credit where it is due.
#Text=The Cons have balanced the budget, which is nice.
#Text=That said, there is a very, very long list of reasons beyond the budget why I won't vote for the Conservatives this election.
